program.name: sphinx

module.script-header:
_pysubdir="python27"
_install_prefix="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/${_pysubdir}" # Don't install binaries and man pages for non-default python _binman_prefix="${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/_inst"

_pysubdir="python26"
_install_prefix="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/${_pysubdir}" # Don't install binaries and man pages for non-default python _binman_prefix="${SB_BUILD_PREFIX}/_inst"

The directory is automatically added to the correct Python include.paths.d directory by the postinstall script.
